author: dreiss
msg: Haskell and OCaml need to override this to put typedefs at the end.

author: dreiss
msg: Make cleanup.sh work a little better.

author: dreiss
msg: We are doing an assert in main, but the assert header is being pulled in
by an include that is about to go.  Make it explicit.

author: dreiss
msg: Delete code generators after using them.
This has been leaking memory in the compiler, but it has also been
preventing the dynamic generators destructors from being called.
This can prevent a stream from being flushed properly.
